input.sentences: we decided to just be a little crazy at work .
we finished the project early and decided to relax .
even the manager is relaxing a little .
the whole project team is ready to party because the project was a success .
output.sentences: Today at work my friends decided to have a little party.
We were all happy and just a big silly.
Someone even brought in some big candy, my pal was happy about that.
We made sure every one was ready for the party.
Once it started in the conference room, we got just a little silly!
